title: 11/20/20 HOUR 2- Frank Isola and Daniel Jeremiah
itunes:title: 11/20/20 HOUR 2- Frank Isola and Daniel Jeremiah
description:
Frank Isola talks to Dan about Gordon Haward opting out of his Boston Celtics contract. Frank says that is looks like Gordon is looking for a sign and trade. Daniel Jeremiah gives Dan his evaluation on Taysom Hill and why Sean Payton is all in on him starting for the Saints.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
